description: I. Sex and relationships education (SRE) in the new curriculum (subject to parliamentary approval). 2 p. II. Populus/Blue Rubicon sex education poll and survey. 6 p. III. PSHE (personal, social, health and economic education): personal wellbeing. 10 p. IV. PSHE in the new primary curriculum area of learning: 'physical development, health and wellbeing'. 2 p. V. Personal, social, health and economic education: curriculum reform consultation report to the DCSF. 16 p.
department: Dept for Children, Schools and Families
